document_data.name: Shrine of the Jade Monolith
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shrine of the Jade Monolith''' was a temple dedicated to the [[yikarian]] [[Faceless God]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite dragon/241/Campaign Classics: The Roof of the World}}
document_data.Location: The temple was located in the city of [[Lipo]] along the coast of the [[Great Sea]] in the [[Sun's Eye]] province of the [[Yikarian Empire]].
document_data.Activity: Since the yikarians of Lipo were more tolerant of outsiders compared to others of their race, many pilgrims came to the Shrine of the Jade Monolith with the hopes of having one of the yak-folk plead to the Faceless God on their behalf.
